div:
Introduction This resource is an observation of a Mammography Duct. It is typically one observation of a set of related observations that comprise a finding. This and its related obsevations are all referenced by a parent 'section' observation by that parents 'Observation.hasMember' element.
Graphical Overview
This graph provides an overview of:
what resources reference Mammography Duct
what resources Mammography Duct references
Review Status
NotReviewed
Member Fields
The following are parts of this observation that are contained within this resource.
Each field contains one data item and is stored as an item (slice) in the Observation.component element.
BiRads Assessment Category component
Density component
Margin component
MG AbnormalityDuct Type component
Observed Change In Abnormality component
Observed Count component
Orientation of an abnormality component
Shape component
Size of an abnormality component
Member Observations
The following are parts of this observation that are stored in seperate observation resources.
The reference to each external observation is stored as an item in the Observation.hasMember element.
'Consistent With' reference
Profile Fragments
The following are the fragments that are included in this profile. This is included for developers use to understand the hierarchy and commonality of disparate profiles..
BreastRad Observation NoDevice Fragment
MG Common Targets Fragment
MG Shape Targets Fragment
Observation Leaf Fragment
